Initially, Wu Wang with Shu Yu mother meet time, dreamed heaven told Wu Wang said: 'I command woman give birth son, name Yu, I give him Tang.' King Wu died. King Cheng ascended. Tang had a rebellion. The Duke of Zhou executed and extinguished Tang. Tang was east of the He and Fen rivers, a square of a hundred li. Therefore he was called Tang Shu Yu. His surname was the Ji clan. His courtesy name was Zi Yu.

In the sixteenth year, Jin's Duke Xian made two armies. The gong led the upper army. Crown Prince Shen Sheng led the lower army. Zhao Su drove the chariot. Bi Wan was on the right. They attacked and extinguished Huo, extinguished Wei, extinguished Geng. Upon returning, for the crown prince he walled Qu Wo. He granted Zhao Su Geng, granted Bi Wan Wei, to be grand officers. Shi Wei said: 'Crown prince not able established.' Divided him capital city, and positioned with qing, first made him pole, again how obtain establish!' It would be better to flee it. Do not let crime arrive. Be Wu Tai Bo, not also permissible, still have good name.' The crown prince did not follow. Bu Yan said: 'Bi Wan descendants must great. Wan, full number; Wei is a great name. Beginning the reward with thisâ€”heaven opened it. Tian zi called myriad people, feudal lords called ten thousand people, now name it great, to follow full number, it must have multitude.' Initially, Bi Wan divined about serving in Jin state and encountered Tun of Bi. Xin Liao divined it said: 'Auspicious. Tun is solid, Bi enters. What auspiciousness is greater than this? Its descendants must flourish prosperous.'

åä¸ƒå¹´ï¼Œæ™‰ä¾¯ä½¿å¤ªå­ç”³ç”Ÿä¼æ±å±±ã€‚ è£å…‹è««ç»å…¬æ›°ï¼šã€Œå¤ªå­å¥‰å†¢ç¥€ç¤¾ç¨·ä¹‹ç²¢ç››ï¼Œä»¥æœå¤•è¦–å›è†³è€…ä¹Ÿï¼Œæ•…æ›°å†¢å­ã€‚ å›è¡Œå‰‡å®ˆï¼Œæœ‰å®ˆå‰‡å¾ï¼Œå¾æ›°æ’«è»ï¼Œå®ˆæ›°ç›£åœ‹ï¼Œå¤ä¹‹åˆ¶ä¹Ÿã€‚ å¤«ç‡å¸«ï¼Œå°ˆè¡Œè¬€ä¹Ÿï¼› èª“è»æ—…ï¼Œå›èˆ‡åœ‹æ”¿ä¹‹æ‰€åœ–ä¹Ÿï¼šéå¤ªå­ä¹‹äº‹ä¹Ÿã€‚ å¸«åœ¨åˆ¶å‘½è€Œå·²ï¼Œç¨Ÿå‘½å‰‡ä¸å¨ï¼Œå°ˆå‘½å‰‡ä¸å­ï¼Œæ•…å›ä¹‹å—£é©ä¸å¯ä»¥å¸¥å¸«ã€‚ å›å¤±å…¶å®˜ï¼Œç‡å¸«ä¸å¨ï¼Œå°‡å®‰ç”¨ä¹‹ï¼Ÿã€ å…¬æ›°ï¼šã€Œå¯¡äººæœ‰å­ï¼ŒæœªçŸ¥å…¶å¤ªå­èª°ç«‹ã€‚ã€ è£å…‹ä¸å°è€Œé€€ï¼Œè¦‹å¤ªå­ã€‚ å¤ªå­æ›°ï¼šã€Œå¾å…¶å»¢ä¹ï¼Ÿã€ è£å…‹æ›°ï¼šã€Œå¤ªå­å‹‰ä¹‹ï¼ æ•™ä»¥è»æ—…ï¼Œä¸å…±æ˜¯æ‡¼ï¼Œä½•æ•…å»¢ä¹ï¼Ÿ ä¸”å­æ‡¼ä¸å­ï¼Œæ¯‹æ‡¼ä¸å¾—ç«‹ã€‚ ä¿®å·±è€Œä¸è²¬äººï¼Œå‰‡å…æ–¼é›£ã€‚ã€ å¤ªå­å¸¥å¸«ï¼Œå…¬è¡£ä¹‹åè¡£ï¼Œä½©ä¹‹é‡‘ç¦ã€‚ è£å…‹è¬ç—…ï¼Œä¸å¾å¤ªå­ã€‚ å¤ªå­é‚ä¼æ±å±±ã€‚
In the seventeenth year, the Jin Hou made Crown Prince Shen Sheng attack Dong Shan. Li Ke admonished Xian Gong said: 'Crown prince offers ancestral sacrifices state altars millet offerings, with morning evening oversees lord meals, therefore called eldest son. When the lord goes, then there is a guard. Having a guard, then there is following. Following is called soothing the army. Guarding is called overseeing the state. This is the ancient system. Leading troops, monopolizing action planning; Oathing armies, lord and state governance what plotted: not crown prince matter. The troops are in controlling commands only. Receiving commands then not awe-inspiring. Monopolizing commands then not filial. Therefore the lord's proper heir cannot lead troops. Lord loses his office, leads troops not awe-inspiring, how use it?' Gong said: 'I have sons, not know their crown prince who establish.' Li Ke did not reply and retreated. He saw the crown prince. Crown prince said: 'I perhaps deposed?' Li Ke said: 'Crown prince strive!' Taught with armies, not share this fear, why deposed? Moreover, fear not being filial. Do not fear not being established. Cultivate self and not blame others, then avoid calamity.' The crown prince led troops. The gong clothed him in a one-sided robe and belted him with a gold jue. Li Ke declined with illness. He did not follow the crown prince. The crown prince then attacked Dong Shan.

Nineteenth year, Xian Gong said: 'Beginning my first lords Zhuang Bo, Wu Gong executed Jin chaos, and Guo often helped Jin attacked me, again hid Jin fled princes, indeed made rebellion. Not execute, later leave descendants worry.' He then made Xun Xi with Qu Chan's horses request passage through Yu. Yu granted passage. He then attacked Guo, took its Xia Yang and returned.

Twenty-first year, Li Ji told crown prince said: 'Lord dreamed saw Qi Jiang, crown prince quickly sacrifice Qu Wo, return blessing to lord.' The crown prince then sacrificed to his mother Qi Jiang at Qu Wo and presented the sacrificial meat to Duke Xian. Duke Xian at the time went hunting and placed the meat in the palace. Li Ji made people place poison in the meat. He stayed two days. Duke Xian came back from hunting. The cook presented the meat to Duke Xian. Duke Xian desired to taste it. Li Ji from side stopped him, said: 'Meat where from come far, should test it.' Sacrificed earth, earth rose; Gave to dog, dog died; He gave it to a small minister, and the small minister died. Li Ji wept said: 'Crown prince how cruel! His father and desires assassinate replace him, moreover others? Moreover lord old, morning evening person, once cannot wait and desires assassinate him!' Told Xian Gong said: 'Crown prince so do, not more than because concubine and Xi Qi reason. I wish mother and son would avoid to another state. If we suicide early, we won't vainly let mother and son be butchered by the crown prince. Beginning lord desired depose him, concubine still resented it; Until now, concubine especially self lost at this.' The crown prince heard of it and fled to Xin Cheng. Duke Xian was angered and then executed his tutor Du Yuan Kuan. Someone told crown prince said: 'Made this medicine was Li Ji, crown prince why not self explain clarify it?' Crown prince said: 'My lord old, without Li Ji, sleep not peaceful, eat not sweet. If I explain it, the lord will be angry about it. Not permissible.' Someone told crown prince said: 'Can flee other state.' Crown prince said: 'Carry this evil name to leave, people who accept me? I suicide.' In the twelfth month, Wu Shen, Shen Sheng committed suicide at Xin Cheng.

At this time, Chong Er and Yi Wu came to court. Someone told Li Ji said: 'Two princes resent Li Ji slandered killed crown prince.' Li Ji feared, therefore slandered two princes: 'Shen Sheng medicine meat, two princes knew it.' The two sons heard of it and feared. Shi Wei apologized said: 'Border cities few bandits, why use them?' Retreated and sang said: 'Fox fur robe bushy, one state three gong, I who follow!' He finally completed the cities. When Shen Sheng died, the two sons also returned and protected their cities.

In the twenty-second year, Duke Xian was angered that the two sons left without bidding farewell. Indeed they had a plot. He then made troops attack Pu. Pu's eunuch Bo Di commanded Chong Er to hurry and commit suicide. Chong Er leaped over the wall. The eunuch pursued and cut his robe sleeve. Chong Er then fled to Di. He made people attack Qu. The Qu city defended, and it could not be conquered.

This year, Jin again requested passage through Yu to attack Guo. Yu grand officer Gong Zhi Qi admonished Yu lord said: 'Jin not can grant road, this about extinguish Yu.' Yu lord said: 'Jin I same surname, not proper attack me.' Gong Zhi Qi said: 'Tai Bo, Yu Zhong, Tai Wang sons, Tai Bo fled away, therefore not succeeded. Guo Zhong and Guo Shu were Wang Ji's sons. They served as Wen Wang's qing shi. Their recorded merits are in the wang chamber, stored in the alliance treasury. Will Guo be extinguished, why cherish Yu? Moreover Yu kinship can closer than Huan, Zhuang clans? What crime did the Huan and Zhuang clans commit? They completely extinguished them. Yu and Guo, lips and teeth, lips gone then teeth cold.' In the twenty-third year, Duke Xian then sent Jia Hua and others to attack Qu. Qu collapsed. Yi Wu was about to flee to Di. In the twenty-sixth year summer, Qi's Duke Huan held a great assembly of feudal lords at Kui Qiu. Duke Xian of Jin was ill. He went after, but had not yet arrived when he met Zhou's steward Kong. Steward Kong said: 'Qi Huan Gong increasingly arrogant, not attends virtue but attends distant strategies, feudal lords not content. Lord do not assemble, not as Jin what.' Duke Xian was also ill, and again returned home. Illness severe, then told Xun Xi said: 'I make Xi Qi successor, year young, various ministers not submit, fear chaos rise, you can establish him?' Xun Xi said: 'Can.' Xian Gong said: 'What to make verification?' Replied said: 'Make dead revive, living not ashamed, make verification.' Thereupon they then entrusted Xi Qi to Xun Xi. Xun Xi became chancellor and controlled the state government. In the autumn ninth month, Duke Xian died. Li Ke, Pi Zheng desired enter Chong Er, with three princes followers make chaos, told Xun Xi said: 'Three resentments will rise, Qin, Jin help them, you will how?' Xun Xi said: 'I cannot betray former lord words.' In the tenth month, Li Ke killed Xi Qi at the mourning place. Duke Xian had not yet been buried. Xun Xi was about to die for it. Someone said it would be better to establish Xi Qi's younger brother Dao Zi and tutor him. Xun Xi established Dao Zi and buried Duke Xian. In the eleventh month, Li Ke assassinated Dao Zi in the court. Xun Xi died for it. Gentleman said: 'Shi called 'white gui blemish, still can grind, this words blemish, not can do', its Xun Xi speak! Not betray his words.' Initially, Xian Gong about to attack Li Rong, divination said 'teeth fangs become calamity'. When he broke the Li Rong and obtained Li Ji, he loved her. In the end this brought chaos to Jin.

Li Ke and others had already killed Xi Qi and Dao Zi. They sent people to welcome Prince Chong Er from Di, desiring to establish him. Chong Er declined said: 'Carried father command fled, father died not able cultivate person son ritual attend mourning, Chong Er how dare enter! Grand officers should change establish other son.' They returned and reported to Li Ke. Li Ke made them welcome Yi Wu from Liang. Yi Wu desired go, Lu Sheng, Xi Rui said: 'Inside still have prince can establish and outside seek, difficult trust. Plan not of Qin, help strong state might to enter, fear danger.' Then made Xi Rui thickly bribe Qin, agreed said: 'If obtain enter, please with Jin He Xi land give Qin.' And sent Li Ke letter said: 'Truly obtain establish, please then enfeoff son at Fen Yang city.' Qin Mu Gong then sent troops to send Yi Wu to Jin. Qi Huan Gong heard of Jin's internal chaos and also led the feudal lords to go to Jin. Qin troops with Yi Wu also arrived at Jin. Qi then made Xi Peng meet with Qin to together enter Yi Wu and establish him as Jin's lord, who became Duke Hui. Qi Huan Gong arrived at Jin's Gao Liang and returned home.

Hui Gong Yi Wu first year, made Pi Zheng thank Qin said: 'Beginning Yi Wu with He Xi land promised lord, now fortunately obtain enter establish. In the fifth year, Qin suffered famine and requested grain from Jin. Jin lord consulted it, Qing Zheng said: 'With Qin obtained establishment, then doubled their land agreement. In the sixth year spring, Qin Mu Gong led troops to attack Jin. Jin Hui Gong told Qing Zheng said: 'Qin army deep, what to do?' Zheng said: 'Qin brought in lord, lord doubled their bribe; Jin famine Qin transported grain, Qin famine and Jin doubled it, then desired take advantage famine attack them: their deep not also proper!' Jin divined the chariot driver and right side. Qing Zheng was all auspicious. Gong said: 'Zheng not filial.' He then again commanded Bu Yang to drive the chariot, family slave Tu as the right, and advanced the troops. In the ninth month, Ren Xu, Qin Mu Gong and Jin Hui Gong joined battle at Han Yuan. Duke Hui's horse stumbled and would not go. Qin troops arrived. The gong was distressed and summoned Qing Zheng as driver. Zheng said: 'Not used divination, defeat not also proper!' He then left. He again commanded Liang You Mi to drive, Guo She as right, and pursued Qin Mu Gong. Mu Gong's strong men braved and defeated the Jin army. The Jin army was defeated. They then lost Qin Mu Gong, but instead captured the Jin gong to return. Qin was about to sacrifice him to the Shang Di. The Jin lord's elder sister was Mu Gong's wife. She wept in mourning garments. Gong said: 'Obtained Jin hou will take as joy, now then like this. Moreover I heard Ji Zi saw Tang Shu initial enfeoffment, said 'his descendants must greatly', Jin how can extinguish!' He then allied with the Jin hou at Wang Cheng and permitted him to return. Jin hou also made Lu Sheng etc. report state people said: 'I though obtain return, no face see altars, divine day establish Zi Yu.' The Jin people heard it and all cried. Qin Mu Gong asked Lu Sheng: 'Jin state harmonious?' Replied said: 'Not harmonious. Small people fear lose lord lose kin, not dread establish Zi Yu, said 'must avenge enmity, rather serve Rong, Di'. Their gentlemen then love lord and know guilt, to await Qin command, said 'must repay virtue'. Have these two reasons, not harmonious.' Thereupon Qin Mu Gong again lodged Jin Hui Gong and gifted him seven sets of animals. In the eleventh month, they returned the Jin hou. The Jin hou arrived in the state, executed Qing Zheng, and repaired the government teachings. Consulted said: 'Chong Er outside, feudal lords many profit bring in him.' He desired to make people kill Chong Er at Di. Chong Er heard of it and went to Qi.

Liang Bo divined it. The male would be a minister to others, the female a concubine to others. Therefore he named the male Yu and the female Concubine.

In the thirteenth year, Jin Hui Gong was ill. He had several sons inside. Crown prince Yu said: 'My mother family in Liang, Liang now Qin extinguished it, I outside light to Qin and inside no aid in state. Lord if not rise, ill grand officers light, change establish other prince.' He then plotted with his wife to together flee and return. Qin woman said: 'You one state crown prince, humiliated here. Qin made a maidservant attend, to strengthen your heart. You flee, I not follow you, also not dare speak.' Zi Yu then fled and returned to Jin. In the fourteenth year ninth month, Hui Gong died. Jin Wen Gong Chong Er was Jin Xian Gong's son. From when Xian Gong was crown prince, Chong Er was indeed already an adult. When Xian Gong ascended the throne, Chong Er was twenty-one years old. In Xian Gong's thirteenth year, because of Li Ji, Chong Er prepared Pu city to defend against Qin. In Xian Gong's twenty-first year, Xian Gong killed Crown Prince Shen Sheng. Li Ji had slandered him. Chong Er feared and, without bidding farewell to Xian Gong, defended Pu city. In Xian Gong's twenty-second year, Xian Gong made the eunuch Lu Di hurry to kill Chong Er. Chong Er leaped over the wall. The eunuch pursued and cut his robe sleeve. Chong Er then fled to Di. Di was his mother's state. At this time Chong Er was forty-three years old. These five scholars followed him. Di attacked Jiu Ru, obtained two women: with elder daughter married Chong Er, gave birth Bo Tao, Shu Liu; they married the younger daughter to Zhao Cui. She gave birth to Dun. Chong Er went to Chu. King Cheng of Chu treated him with the ritual suitable for feudal lords. Chong Er declined and dared not accept. Zhao Cui said: 'You fled outside ten remaining years, small states slight you, moreover great states? Now Chu great state and surely meet you, you should not decline, this heaven opens you.' He then saw him with guest rituals. King Cheng treated Chong Er thickly. Chong Er was very humble. Cheng Wang said: 'You if return state, what with repay me?' Chong Er said: 'Feathers fur teeth horns jade silks, lord king what remains, not know what with repay.' Wang said: 'Although this, what with repay unworthy?' Chong Er said: 'If not able avoid, with lord king with war chariots meet plain broad marsh, please avoid wang three she.' Chu general Zi Yu angered said: 'Wang treats Jin prince extremely thick, now Chong Er words not filial, please kill him.' Cheng Wang said: 'Jin prince worthy and distressed outside long, followers all state vessels, this heaven placed, how can kill? Moreover words what with change it!' Lived Chu several months, and Jin crown prince Yu fled Qin, Qin resented it; they heard Chong Er was in Chu and then summoned him. Cheng Wang said: 'Chu far, pass several states then reach Jin. Qin Jin border adjacent, Qin lord worthy, you should diligently go!' He thickly sent Chong Er.

Chong Er arrived at Qin. Mu Gong married five clan daughters to Chong Er. Zi Yu's former wife also went with them. Chong Er not desired receive, Si Kong Ji Zi said: 'His state about attack, moreover his former wife! Moreover receive to tie Qin kinship and seek enter, you then constrained small ritual, forget great shame!' He then received them. Mu Gong was greatly happy and drank with Chong Er. Zhao Cui sang the 'Shu Miao' poem. Mu Gong said: 'Know you desire urgently return state.' Zhao Cui with Chong Er descended, twice bowed said: 'Orphan minister looks up lord, like hundred grains hope season rain.' At this time it was Jin Hui Gong's fourteenth year autumn. Hui Gong died in the ninth month. Zi Yu was established. In the eleventh month, they buried Duke Hui. In the twelfth month, Jin state's grand officers Luan, Xi and others heard Chong Er was in Qin. They all secretly came to urge Chong Er, Zhao Cui and others to return to the state, acting as very many inner supporters. Thereupon Qin Mu Gong then sent troops with Chong Er to return to Jin. Jin heard Qin troops were coming and also sent troops to resist them. However, they all secretly knew that Prince Chong Er was entering. Only Duke Hui's former noble ministers of the Lu and Xi kind did not desire to establish Chong Er. Chong Er fled for a total of nineteen years and obtained entry. At that time he was sixty-two years old. Many Jin people attached themselves to him.

In Duke Wen's first year spring, Qin sent Chong Er to the river. Jiu Fan said: 'Minister followed lord wandered world, faults also many. Minister still knows it, moreover lord? Please from this leave.' Chong Er said: 'If return state, what not with Zi Fan share, He Bo watch it!' He then threw the jade into the river middle, to ally with Zi Fan. At this time Jie Zi Tui followed, in boat middle, then laughed said: 'Heaven truly opened prince, but Zi Fan takes as own merit and demands reward from lord, indeed sufficient shame. I not endure with same position.' He then hid himself and crossed the river. Qin troops surrounded Ling Hu. Jin troops were at Lu Liu. In the second month, Xin Chou, Jiu Fan allied with Qin and Jin grand officers at Xun. On Ren Yin, Chong Er entered the Jin army. On Bing Wu, he entered Qu Wo. On Ding Wei, he courted at the Wu Palace, ascended the throne as Jin's lord, who became Duke Wen. All the ministers went. Duke Huai Yu fled to Gao Liang. On Wu Shen, he made people kill Duke Huai.

Duke Huai's former ministers Lu Sheng and Xi Rui originally did not attach to Duke Wen. Hui Gong with you agreed three days arrive, but you one day arrived, why so fast? You should think of it.' Eunuch said: 'Minister knife saw remainder, dared not with two hearts serve lord betray master, therefore offended lord. Lord already returned state, his mother Pu, Di? Thereupon he saw him, and then told Duke Wen about Lu, Xi and others. Duke Wen desired to summon Lu and Xi. Lu and Xi's party was many. Duke Wen feared that upon initially entering the state, the state people would betray him. He then made a secret journey and met Qin Mu Gong at Wang Cheng. The state people did not know. In the third month, Ji Chou, Lu, Xi and others indeed rebelled, burned the gong palace, but did not obtain Duke Wen. Duke Wen's Wei followers fought with them. Lu and Xi led troops desiring to flee. Duke Wen repaired the government and bestowed favor on the common people. He rewarded those who had followed in flight and meritorious ministers. The great ones were enfeoffed with cities, the small ones honored with ranks. He desired to send troops but feared other chaos would rise. Therefore, the reward for those who followed in flight had not yet reached the hidden Jie Zi Tui. Below risk their crime, above reward their treachery, upper lower mutually deceive, difficult with dwell!' His mother said: 'Why also seek it, with death who resent?' Tui said: 'Blame and imitate it, crime has greater. Moreover issue resentful words, not eat their emolument.' Mother said: 'Also make know it, how?' In the fourth year, Chu Cheng Wang and the feudal lords surrounded Song. Song's Gong Sun Gu went to Jin to urgently tell them. Xian Zhen said: 'Repay bestow establish hegemony, at present here.' In the seventh year, eighth month, Xiang Gong died. The crown prince Yi Gao was young. The Jin people, because of the difficulty, desired to establish an elder lord. Zhao Dun said: 'Establish Xiang Gong younger brother Yong. Good virtue and elder, former lord loved him; Moreover he is close to Qin, with whom we have an old friendship. Establish good then solid, serve elder then orderly, honor love then filial, tie old friendship then peaceful.' Jia Ji said: 'Not as good as his younger brother Le. Chen Ying favored by two lords, establish his son, people must settle with him.' Zhao Dun said: 'Chen Ying base, position below nine people, his son what awe has! Moreover, favored by two lords is licentious. For former lord's son, cannot seek great and went out to small country, eccentric. Mother licentious son eccentric, no authority; Chen small and distant, no support: what can be done!' They sent Shi Hui to Qin to welcome Prince Yong. Jia Ji also sent people to summon Prince Le from Chen. Zhao Dun dismissed Jia Ji because he had killed Yang Chu Fu. In the tenth month, they buried Xiang Gong. In the eleventh month, Jia Ji fled to Di. That same year, Qin Mu Gong also died.

Ling Gong first year fourth month, Qin Kang Gong said: 'Formerly Wen Gong's entry had no guard, therefore had Lu, Xi troubles.' They then greatly provided Prince Yong with guards. Crown prince mother Mu Ying day night embraced crown prince to wail weep at court, said: 'Former lord what crime? His successor also what crime? Abandon proper and outside seek lord, will place this where?' Left court, then embraced to go to Zhao Dun place, knocked head said: 'Former lord presented this son and entrusted to you, said "this son talented, I receive his favor; Not talented, I resent you".' Now lord died, words still in ear, but abandon him, how?' Zhao Dun and the various grandees were all troubled by Mu Ying, and moreover feared execution, so they turned back from what they had welcomed and established the crown prince Yi Gao. This was Ling Gong. They dispatched troops to resist those Qin was sending with Prince Yong. Zhao Dun acted as general and went to attack Qin, defeating them at Ling Hu. Xian Mie and Sui Hui fled and went to Qin. In autumn, the lords of Qi, Song, Wei, Zheng, Cao, and Xu all met with Zhao Dun and allied at Hu, because Ling Gong had newly been established.

In the fourth year, they attacked Qin and took Shao Liang. Qin also took Jin's Xiao. In the sixth year, Qin Kang Gong attacked Jin and took Ji Ma. In the fourteenth year, Ling Gong had grown up and became extravagant, imposing heavy taxes to carve walls. From the tower he shot at people, observing them avoid the pellets. Sui Hui had previously admonished him, but he did not listen. Ling Gong was troubled by it and sent Chu Ni to assassinate Zhao Dun. Initially, Dun often hunted at Shou Mountain and saw a starving person under the mulberry tree. The starving person was Shi Mi Ming. Dun gave him food, and he ate half of it. Asked its reason, said: 'Served three years, unknown mother's survival not, wish send to mother.' Dun regarded it as righteous and gave him even more cooked rice and meat. Later he became Jin's chef, and Zhao Dun did not recognize him again. In the ninth month, Jin Ling Gong drank wine with Zhao Dun, but had hidden armored troops who would attack Dun. Duke chef Shi Mi Ming knew it, feared Dun drunk could not rise, then advanced said: 'Lord grants minister, three rounds of cups can cease.' He desired to remove Zhao Dun and ordered him to leave first, so as not to reach the difficulty. Dun had already gone. Ling Gong's hidden soldiers were not yet assembled, so he first released a biting dog named Ao. Ming wrestled and killed the dog for Dun. Dun said: 'Abandon people use dog, though fierce what for.' In the third year, Chu Zhuang Wang surrounded Zheng, and Zheng urgently reported to Jin. Sixth year, Chu attacked Song, Song came report urgent Jin, Jin desired save it, Bo Zong advised said: 'Chu, heaven just opening it, not resistable.' They then sent Xie Yang Dai to save Song. In the eighth year, sent Xi Ke to Qi. Qi Qing Gong's mother observed from the tower and laughed at him. Xi Ke angered, returned to river upper, said: 'Not repay Qi ones, river lord see it!' He arrived in the country and requested the lord, desiring to attack Qi. Jing Gong asked knew its reason, said: 'Your resentment, how suffices trouble country!' He did not listen. Wei Wen Zi requested to retire in old age and avoided Xi Ke. Ke governed.

In the eleventh year, spring, Qi attacked Lu and took Long. Lu reported urgent to Wei. Wei and Lu both through Xi Ke reported urgent to Jin. Jin then sent Xi Ke, Luan Shu, and Han Jue with eight hundred war chariots and Lu and Wei together to attack Qi. In summer, they battled with Qing Gong at Ai, injured and trapped Qing Gong. Qing Gong then exchanged position with his right-hand man, descended and took a drink, in order to obtain escape and depart. The Qi army was defeated and fled. Jin pursued north to Qi. Qing Gong offered treasure vessels to seek peace, but they did not listen. Xi Ke said: 'Must obtain Xiao Tong nephew son as hostage.' Qi envoy said: 'Xiao Tong nephew son, Qing Gong mother; Qing Gong mother like Jin lord mother, how must obtain her? Not righteous, request again battle.' Jin then permitted peace and departed.

In the sixth year, spring, Zheng double-crossed Jin and allied with Chu. Jin was angered. Luan Shu said: 'Cannot during our generation lose feudal lords.' They then dispatched troops. Li Gong personally led the army. In the fifth month they crossed the river. They heard that Chu troops had come to save them. Fan Wen Zi requested that the duke return. His attendant Shu Yang Gu presented wine. Zi Fan got drunk and could not meet with him. The wang was angered and reproached Zi Fan. Zi Fan died. The wang then led the troops and returned. Li Gong had many external favored consorts. Upon returning, he desired to completely remove the group of grandees and establish his various consorts' brothers. The favored consort's brother was named Xu Tong. He once had resentment with Xi Zhi, and Luan Shu again resented Xi Zhi for not using his plan and then defeating Chu. He then sent people to secretly apologize to Chu. Chu came deceived Li Gong said: 'Yan Ling battle, Xi Zhi summoned Chu, desired make rebellion, inner son Zhou establish him. Meeting with state not prepared, therefore matter not accomplished.' Li Gong told Luan Shu. Luan Shu said: 'It probably has it! Wish duke try send people to Zhou secretly examine it.' Indeed they sent Xi Zhi to Zhou. Luan Shu again sent Prince Zhou to meet Xi Zhi. Xi Zhi did not know he was being betrayed. Li Gong verified it and believed it truly. He then resented Xi Zhi and desired to kill him. In the eighth year, Li Gong went hunting and drank with his consort. Xi Zhi killed a pig and presented it. A eunuch seized it. Xi Zhi shot and killed the eunuch. Duke angered, said: 'Ji Zi deceives me!' He would execute the three Xi, but had not yet dispatched the order. Xi Gou desired attack duke, said: 'I though die, duke also ill.' Xi Zhi said: 'Faithfulness not betray lord, wisdom not harm people, courage not make rebellion. Lose these three, who with me? I die only!' In the twelfth month on Ren Wu, the duke ordered Xu Tong with eight hundred troops to attack and kill the three Xi. Xu Tong then with kidnapped Luan Shu, Zhong Xing Yan at court, said: 'Not kill two sons, trouble must reach duke.' Duke said: 'Suddenly kill three ministers, I not bear moreover.' Answered said: 'People will bear lord.' Duke not listened, apologized Luan Shu etc. with executed Xi clan crime: 'Grandees resume position.' Two sons knocked heads said: 'Fortunate extremely fortunate extremely!' The duke made Xu Tong a minister. In the leap month on Yi Mao, Li Gong toured the Jiang Li clan. Dao Gong Zhou was such that his grandfather Jie was Jin Xiang Gong's youngest son. He was not able to be established and was styled Huan Shu. Huan Shu was most loved. Dao Gong said: 'Grandfather, father all not able established and avoided difficulty at Zhou, died as guest there. I myself consider myself distant and not nearly worthy to become lord. Now grandees not forget Wen, Xiang intention and kindly establish Huan Shu successor, rely ancestral temple grandees spirit, obtain serve Jin sacrifices, how dare not tremble? Grandees also assist me!' In autumn, attacked Zheng. The Zheng army was defeated, and they then arrived at Chen.

ä¸‰å¹´ï¼Œæ™‰æœƒè«¸ä¾¯ã€‚ æ‚¼å…¬å•ç¾¤è‡£å¯ç”¨è€…ï¼Œç¥å‚’èˆ‰è§£ç‹ã€‚ è§£ç‹ï¼Œå‚’ä¹‹ä»‡ã€‚ å¾©å•ï¼Œèˆ‰å…¶å­ç¥åˆã€‚ å›å­æ›°ï¼šã€Œç¥å‚’å¯è¬‚ä¸é»¨çŸ£ï¼ å¤–èˆ‰ä¸éš±ä»‡ï¼Œå…§èˆ‰ä¸éš±å­ã€‚ã€ æ–¹æœƒè«¸ä¾¯ï¼Œæ‚¼å…¬å¼Ÿæ¥Šå¹²äº‚è¡Œï¼Œé­çµ³æˆ®å…¶ä»†ã€‚ æ‚¼å…¬æ€’ï¼Œæˆ–è««å…¬ï¼Œå…¬å’è³¢çµ³ï¼Œä»»ä¹‹æ”¿ï¼Œä½¿å’Œæˆï¼Œæˆå¤§è¦ªé™„ã€‚ åä¸€å¹´ï¼Œæ‚¼å…¬æ›°ï¼šã€Œè‡ªå¾ç”¨é­çµ³ï¼Œä¹åˆè«¸ä¾¯ï¼Œå’Œæˆã€ç¿Ÿï¼Œé­å­ä¹‹åŠ›ä¹Ÿã€‚ã€ è³œä¹‹æ¨‚ï¼Œä¸‰è®“ä¹ƒå—ä¹‹ã€‚ å†¬ï¼Œç§¦å–æˆ‘æ«Ÿã€‚
In the third year, Jin met with the feudal lords. Dao Gong asked the group of ministers for usable ones, and Qi Xi raised Xie Hu. Xie Hu, Xi's enemy. He asked again, and raised his son Qi Wu. Superior man said: 'Qi Xi can be called not partisan! Externally raise not conceal enemy, internally raise not conceal son.' Just as they were meeting the feudal lords, Dao Gong's younger brother Yang Gan disrupted the procession. Wei Jiang executed his charioteer. Dao Gong was angered. Some advised the duke, and the duke ultimately valued Jiang, entrusted him with governance, and made him pacify the Rong. The Rong greatly attached closely. Eleventh year, Dao Gong said: 'Since I used Wei Jiang, nine times united feudal lords, pacified Rong, Di, Wei Zi's strength.' He granted him music. He declined three times before receiving it. In winter, Qin took our Li.
114
åå››å¹´ï¼Œæ™‰ä½¿å…­å¿ç‡è«¸ä¾¯ä¼ç§¦ï¼Œåº¦æ¶‡ï¼Œå¤§æ•—ç§¦è»ï¼Œè‡³æ£«æ—è€Œå»ã€‚
In the fourteenth year, Jin sent the six ministers to lead the feudal lords and attack Qin. They crossed the Jing, greatly defeated the Qin army, arrived at Yu Lin, and departed.

In the fifteenth year, Dao Gong asked about governing the country from Shi Kuang. Shi Kuang said: 'Only benevolence righteousness as foundation.' In winter, Dao Gong died, and his son Ping Gong Biao was established.

In Ping Gong's first year, attacked Qi. Qi Ling Gong battled at Mi Xia, and the Qi army was defeated and fled. Yan Ying said: 'Lord also not courageous, why not stop battle?' He then departed. Jin pursued, then surrounded Lin Zi, and completely burned and massacred its outer city. East to Jiao, south to Yi, Qi all walled and defended. Jin then led the troops and returned.

In the sixth year, Lu Xiang Gong attended court at Jin. Jin Luan Cheng had a crime and fled to Qi. In the eighth year, Qi Zhuang Gong secretly sent Luan Cheng to Qu Wo, with troops following him. The Qi troops ascended Tai Hang. Luan Cheng rebelled from within Qu Wo and attacked, entering Jiang. Jiang was not prepared. Ping Gong desired suicide. Fan Xian Zi stopped the duke and with his followers attacked Cheng. Cheng was defeated and fled to Qu Wo. Qu Wo attacked Cheng. Cheng died, and they then extinguished the Luan clan lineage. Cheng was Luan Shu's grandson. His entering Jiang was plotted with the Wei clan. Qi Zhuang Gong heard Cheng defeated, then returned, took Jin's Zhao Ge departed, to repay Lin Zi campaign.

In the tenth year, Qi Cui Zhu assassinated his lord Zhuang Gong. Jin, because of Qi's disorder, attacked and defeated Qi at Gao Tang and departed, repaying the Tai Hang campaign.

Fourteenth year, Wu Yan Ling Ji Zi came envoy, with Zhao Wen Zi, Han Xuan Zi, Wei Xian Zi spoke, said: 'Jin country's governance, ultimately belongs these three houses.'

In the nineteenth year, Qi sent Yan Ying to Jin, and he spoke with Shu Xiang. Shu Xiang said: 'Jin, final generation. Duke heavy taxes for towers ponds but not cares governance, governance in private gates, how can long endure!' Yan Zi assented to it.

In Qing Gong's sixth year, Zhou Jing Wang died, and the wang's sons contended for establishment. The Jin six ministers pacified the wang chamber's disorder and established Jing Wang.

In the ninth year, the Lu Ji clan expelled their lord Zhao Gong, and Zhao Gong resided at Qian Hou. In the eleventh year, Wei and Song sent envoys requesting that Jin accept the Lu lord. Twelfth year, Jin's ancestral house Qi Xi grandson, Shu Xiang son, mutually disliked by lord. The six ministers desired to weaken the ducal chamber, so they accordingly used the law to completely extinguish their clan. And they divided their cities into ten counties, each ordering their son to be a grandee. Jin became increasingly weak, while the six ministers all became great.

In the fourteenth year, Qing Gong died, and his son Ding Gong Wu was established. In Ding Gong's eleventh year, Lu Yang Hu fled to Jin, and Zhao Yang Jian Zi sheltered him. In the twelfth year, Kong Qiu became prime minister of Lu.

In the fifteenth year, Zhao Yang sent the Han Dan grandee Wu, but he was not trusted and desired to kill Wu. Wu, with Zhong Xing Yin and Fan Ji She, personally attacked Zhao Yang. Yang fled and defended Jin Yang. Ding Gong surrounded Jin Yang. Xun Yue, Han Bu Xin, and Wei Chi were enemies with Fan and Zhong Xing, so they shifted troops to attack Fan and Zhong Xing. Fan and Zhong Xing rebelled. The Jin lord attacked them and defeated Fan and Zhong Xing. Fan and Zhong Xing fled to Zhao Ge and defended it. Han and Wei apologized to the Jin lord for Zhao Yang, and he was then pardoned and restored to his position. In the twenty-second year, Jin defeated the Fan and Zhong Xing clans, and the two sons fled to Qi.

In the thirtieth year, Ding Gong met with Wu Wang Fu Chai at Huang Chi and contended for seniority. Zhao Yang followed at the time, and ultimately Wu was senior.

In Chu Gong's seventeenth year, Zhi Bo with Zhao, Han, and Wei together divided the Fan and Zhong Xing lands as their cities. Chu Gong was angered and told Qi and Lu, desiring to attack the four ministers with them. The four ministers feared, so they then counterattacked Chu Gong. Chu Gong fled to Qi and died on the road. Therefore Zhi Bo then established Zhao Gong's great-grandson Jiao as Jin lord. This was Ai Gong.

Ai Gong's grandfather Yong was Jin Zhao Gong's youngest son and was styled Dai Zi. Dai Zi begot Ji. Ji was good to Zhi Bo but died early. Therefore Zhi Bo desired to completely annex Jin but did not dare, so he established Ji's son Jiao as lord. At this time, Jin country's governance all decided Zhi Bo, Jin Ai Gong could not have any control. Zhi Bo then possessed the Fan and Zhong Xing lands and was the strongest.

Grand historian said: Jin Wen Gong, ancient called enlightened lord, fled resided outside nineteen years, extremely distressed constrained, when ascended throne performed rewards, still forgot Jie Zi Tui, moreover arrogant lords?
